issues.description: The problem statement text instructs students to use StringBuilder for the Animal.name attribute, but the UML diagram shows name: String and the reference solution declares it as a String. This inconsistency will confuse students about which type to use and leads to a constructor signature mismatch.
issues.suggested_fix: Unify the name attribute type across the UML, textual instructions, and solution: either change the UML and solution to use StringBuilder (and adjust constructor and getter/setter accordingly) or remove the StringBuilder requirement in the text and consistently use String for the name attribute.
